s3.message: Fixed: No preview in the list of blockable items if the image matches a disabled filter.

s7.message: Some users will be asked to complete a survey about Adblock Plus (forum topic).

s5.message: Fixed: More issues caused by corrupted patterns.ini file (forum topic).

s4.message: Fixed: Failure to save filters cache in Firefox 8, affects startup performance (forum topic).
